speaker: Customer
text: You have reached voicemail for John Doe. Please leave a message after the beep.

speaker: Agent
text: Hello, John. This is Sarah from ABC Collections. I'm calling about your outstanding balance.

speaker: Customer
text: To leave a message, please record after the beep.

speaker: Agent
text: It's important that we discuss this matter as soon as possible to avoid further issues. Please call me back at this number.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you for your call and have a great day.
